data.name: Skinny & Franko: Fists of Violence
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord


About the Game



28 years after the events of 'Franko: The Crazy Revenge', titular anti-hero Franko returns to Poland to get his old friend out of trouble. This time also he will not go easy on his enemies...

Now, with help of his pal Skinny, Franko will wreak havoc in the streets of Szczecin once again.

Skinny & Franko: Fists of Violence is an outstanding and brutal 2D beat'em'up game. Designed by a creator of cult classics like 'Franko: The Crazy Revenge' or 'Doman: Sins of Ardan' that were popular in the 90's on Amiga and PC.



Features:
- play on 8 intense and packed with enemies and boss fights, hand-drawn main stages with a few bonus levels and secret locations
- dive into the story and find out what happend to Skinny and Franko's frined 'Shorty'
- 30k frames of hand drawn, old-school animations
- use over 50 different weapons and special attacks to beat your enemies
- fight over 80 different bullies and morons (no reskins!)
- hand drawn and animated characters in a unique, own style
- car driving and shooting mini-games
- tons of humor and bad language in game
- play solo or in 2-player coop mode



Unique graphical setting, being a combination of realistic world and satire, that create a specific atmosphere, that you will find only here.

data.short_description: Brutal next chapter of Amiga's legendary beat'em'up 'Franko: The Crazy Revenge' is here. It's time to clean the streets of shit. The iconic game finally gets a sequel it deserves.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or higher
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz dual-core recommended
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 or AMD equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence, blood, alcohol and suggestive sexual scenes.
